entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (quest_u10_hraykken_bender.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_28: Oh good, you'll do. My brother, Draykken, is set to assault a droid factory, but needs some troops to do the actual work...er, I mean to help out. I'm sending you.
entries.s_29: Oh, okay. I can do that.
entries.s_30: No, I don't have time right now.
entries.s_31: Good, good. Um...I guess you should get going then. Those droids won't destroy themselves. Believe me...we've been waiting and hoping, but it never works.
entries.s_32: Ah, I see. Sure thing then. I'm sure someone else will come along eventually. It's not like those droids are going anywhere while we wait.
entries.s_5: Destroying droids is one of my favorite things to do. Or to be more precise, sending other people out to destroy droids.
